summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the Assessment and Assessment Roll of L.I.D. No. 6668 for the improvement of Occidental Ave. S. from S. Washington St. to Yesler Way; by the Construction or reconstruction of the support for the concrete walk to be constructed or reconstructed in the above named street; Yesler Way, south side only from Occidental Ave. S. to approximately 111 feet east thereof; by the construction of a concrete walk; under Ord. No. 105436 as amended by Ord. No. 106645, and Levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
